mapper.insert: insert into teacher (role, number, id, name, password, phone, email, status, major, college) values (#{role},#{number},#{id},#{name},#{password},#{phone},#{email},#{status},#{major},#{college})
mapper.update: UPDATE teacher SET role = #{role}, id = #{id}, name = #{name}, password = #{password}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, status = #{status}, major = #{major}, college = #{college} WHERE number = #{number}
mapper.select: SELECT role, number, id, name, password, phone, email, status, major, college FROM teacher
SELECT role, number, id, name, password, phone, email, status, major, college FROM teacher WHERE number = #{number}
SELECT role, number, id, name, password, phone, email, status, major, college FROM teacher WHERE number = #{number}
SELECT * FROM teacher WHERE college = #{college} and status = "working"
SELECT count(*) FROM teacher WHERE major = #{major} and status = "working"
